trans-unit.source: ReadSpeaker Language [Flush system caches (red) if the voice options don't change, and save again]
Your ReadSpeaker Customer ID (you can find in ReadSpeaker Admin Portal -> Implementation Instructions) (//admin.readspeaker.com/portal/)

ID of the html element that contains the text to read. (Write "content", if ReadSpeaker should read text from
...
)
Check this, if you want to use the old readspeaker button.
Use the constant editor to set up this extension. ("Template" -> "Constant Editor" -> "ReadSpeaker")

You can set up the language and voice in your page properties, sliding down the pagetree. If the voice options don't change after you changed the language, please flush the system caches (red) and save again.
